question: What is MotionMade AI
answer: MotionMade AI is a chat widget that automatically answers customer questions for local service businesses. It uses your FAQs to give instant, accurate responses 24/7 - no more repetitive questions.

question: How much does it cost
answer: Setup is $200-500 depending on complexity. Monthly is $50-150 depending on query volume. No lock-in contracts - cancel anytime.

question: How does it work
answer: We gather your common customer questions, create FAQs, and install a chat widget on your website. It starts answering questions automatically within 30 minutes of setup.

question: What businesses is this for
answer: Local service businesses like electricians, cleaners, plumbers, tradies, landscapers, and other service providers who get repetitive customer questions.

question: Can it handle typos and slang
answer: Yes! It understands messy text, typos, and slang like 'hw much do u charge' or 'r u available 2morrow'. Built for how real customers actually type.

question: What if it doesnt know the answer
answer: If the question isn't covered by your FAQs, it politely asks the customer to contact you directly. It never makes up answers or guesses.

question: How long does setup take
answer: About 30 minutes. We gather your FAQs, configure the widget, and install it on your site. Most businesses are live the same day.

question: Do I need technical skills
answer: No. We handle all the technical setup. You just need to provide your business info and common customer questions. We do the rest.

question: Can I customize the widget
answer: Yes. You can customize the color, position, greeting message, and header text to match your brand.

question: What questions can it answer
answer: Any question you add to your FAQs - pricing, service areas, availability, what you offer, qualifications, guarantees, and more.

question: How do I add or change FAQs
answer: You can update FAQs anytime through our admin dashboard. Changes go live within seconds.

question: Does it work on mobile
answer: Yes. The widget is fully responsive and works on phones, tablets, and desktops.

question: Can it handle multiple questions at once
answer: It answers one question at a time for accuracy. If a customer asks multiple questions, it addresses the main one and invites them to ask more.

question: Is there a free trial
answer: We offer a 2-week pilot period for new customers. Try it on your site, see how it performs, then decide if you want to continue.

question: What about wrong service questions
answer: If someone asks about a service you don't offer (like asking an electrician about plumbing), it politely redirects them. No wrong answers.

question: How fast does it respond
answer: Most responses take 2-4 seconds. Fast enough to feel instant, thorough enough to be helpful.

question: Do you offer support
answer: Yes. Email support is included. We help with FAQ optimization, troubleshooting, and any questions you have.

question: Can I see analytics
answer: Yes. The admin dashboard shows total queries, hit rate, common questions, and response times so you can see how it's performing.

question: What areas do you service
answer: We work with businesses anywhere in Australia. Setup is done remotely - no on-site visit needed.

question: How do I get started
answer: Contact us with your business name, website, and a list of common customer questions. We'll have you set up within 24-48 hours.
